item.description:
Loved the first book in the series.   I was excited when I heard they were making it inot a movie...hope they do a good job with it.

This movie should be very cool to see in the IMAX format.  :)   Please note, tickets are on sale on Fandango already, this will be popular so you should buy your tickets asap.

Showtime is 7PM.    I will arrive at the theater by 6 and will wait outside the ropes until they let us into the inner lobby.   Once they let people inside for seats probably around 6:30 we need to head right in as people make a mad dash for good seats in this theater.  

Please try to get there early.  It is a mad house when the movies are showing downstairs.   Once we have a set of seats saved, we can take turns getting refreshments, etc.   

Once the movie is over, we will try to hang around the hallway outside the room we just saw the movie in, but that is not always possible.  So we will also gather outside for a few minutes to let everyone have a chance to use the restroom and make their way out of the theater.

If you are planning to go to the after event, please bring cash, it makes things so much easier at the restaurant.

 

Movie Details:

Release Date: March 23, 2012
Studio: Lionsgate
Director: Gary Ross
Screenwriter: Gary Ross, Suzanne Collins
Starring: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth, Wes Bentley, Elizabeth Banks, Dayo Okeniyi, Amandla Stenberg, Jack Quaid, Leven Rambin, Willow Shields, Paula Malcomson, Ian Nelson, Kalia Prescott, Ethan Jamieson, Tara Macken, Chris Mark, Jacqueline Emerson, Ashton Moio, Kara Petersen, Sam Ly, Leigha Hancock, Samuel Tan, Mackenzie Lintz, Imanol Yepez-Frias, Annie Thurman, Stanley Tucci, Woody Harrelson, Latarsha Rose, Brooke Bundy, Lenny Kravitz, Toby Jones, Amber Chaney, Kimiko Gelman, Nelson Ascencio, Donald Sutherland
Genre: Action, Drama, Sci-Fi
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website: TheHungerGamesmovie.com | Facebook | Twitter 

Plot Summary: "The Hunger Games" chronicles a dystopic Capitol which requires its twelve subjugated districts to pay tribute in the form of a teenage boy and girl, forced to participate in the annual "Hunger Games," a fight-to-the-death live televised event. Katniss Everdeen’s little sister is chosen in the lottery to participate and Katniss volunteers to take her place. Although persevering through hardship is commonplace for Katniss, she must start making choices that weigh survival against humanity and life against love in order to win the games and return home. The "Hunger Games" novel has been on the New York Times best seller list for over 100 consecutive weeks. Foreign rights for the book, published by Scholastic have been sold in 41 countries
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: The Hunger Games (7PM Imax Show)
